      • queryListByAppIdAndPeopleId

        java.util.List<PeopleAddressEntity> queryListByAppIdAndPeopleId(@Param(value="peopleAddressPeopleId")
                                                              int peopleId,
                                                              @Param(value="peopleAddressAppId")

        通过用户id和站点id查询用户收货地址列表
        参数:
        peopleId - 用户id
        appId - 站点id
        返回:
        用户收货地址列表

      • deleteEntity

        void deleteEntity(@Param(value="peopleAddressId")
                int peopleAddressId,
                @Param(value="peopleAddressAppId")
                int appId)
        根据用户收货地址id和站点id删除收货地址
        参数:
        peopleAddressId - 用户收货地址id
        appId - 站点id

      • getDefaultEntity

        PeopleAddressEntity getDefaultEntity(@Param(value="peopleAddressPeopleId")
                                   int peopleId,
                                   @Param(value="peopleAddressDefault")
                                   int addressDefault)
        根据用户id和地址属性得到地址实体
        参数:
        peopleId - 用户id
        addressDefault - 地址属性(默认为0，非默认为1)
        返回:
        默认用户收货地址
